Key:
(With that said, today I'm going to spend some time
alone with Yuzuru.)

(It was a nice afternoon. I met up with Yuzuru at a
local park.)

I walked slowly and I ended up here right on the dot.
I wonder if Yuzuru's here already.

Call. Shido, over here. Thank you for inviting me out
on a date.
Sure. Did I make you wait?
Deny. Yuzuru just arrived. Don't worry about it.

(In Yuzuru's case, it's hard to know whether or not
she's telling the truth. I mean, last time she was so
early, there's a high chance that she was waiting...)

(But it's pointless to worry about it each time. If she
doesn't mind, I'm sure it's not good for me to worry
about it.)
Okay, then let's go.
Question. Do you want to go anywhere, Shido?

Oh, I thought we were going to meet up here and go
someplace else.

(Yuzuru was the one who suggested meeting here, so I
thought that's what was going to happen. I guess that
wasn't the case.)

Consenting. No, I was planning to spend all day here.
Is that not okay?

Oh, that's fine. Of course I'm okay with it. But
you're okay just staying at the park? I mean, we're
on a date, so we can go where you'd like...

Affirmative. I'm fine with here for today. If we went
somewhere else without Kaguya, I would feel bad.

I see. I guess that's true. I can see Kaguya saying,
"Why didn't you take me!"

Affirmative. Kaguya is a child, so we can't help it.
Yuzuru is the mature one, so I will be satisfied
staying here so that Kaguya won't pout.

(Although she says that, I can tell how much Yuzuru
watches out for Kaguya. I'm sure if we were in the
same situation, Kaguya would've said the same thing.)
Request. Shido, would you like to walk a little?

Bring it on. I guess that's weird to say, but I was
planning on suggesting that.

(Judging by the park map, there seems to be a walkway.
It'll be nice to feel the sunshine through the trees
and take a leisure walk.)
All right, let's start walking.
Silence.
Huh, what's the matter, Yuzuru?

Anger. Shido, why don't you get it? I did suggest to
take a stroll, but do you plan on going alone? You're
forgetting that I am your girlfriend.
Huh? Oh...! Sorry, Yuzuru... You're right.

Pardon. So long as you understand, I don't mind.
Request... Please give me your hand.
Here you go, Yuzuru.
(We walked together, holding hands.)

(I wasn't thinking anything in particular as we slowly
strolled about. The wind blew gently, and Yuzuru
closed her eyes as if it felt nice.)
I feel like I could easily lose track of time here.

Rebuttal. It's true that it feels nice. But since I'm
with you Shido, I don't want to miss a moment.
...That's sweet, but you're making me shy.

Doubt. Really? Yuzuru is just saying what comes to
mind.
Hahaha. That's like you. I'm sure if it were Kaguya...

Attention. Shido, you are on a date with Yuzuru right
now, so wouldn't you say it's rude to bring up another
woman?
What? Not even Kaguya?

Affirmative. Of course. There are times when even
Kaguya is not allowed.
Oh... I'll be careful.

Encouragement. I look forward to your efforts. We've
walked a while, so... Let's rest.

Right. Let's sit on that bench. Should I go buy some
drinks?

(I looked around the park, but there weren't any
vending machines. But there was something else.)
Yuzuru. Fancy going there?
Affirmative. That looks like a food truck. No problem.
Then let me go... Yuzuru, do you like coffee?

Affirmative. If it's a matter of whether or not I can
drink it, there's no problem. How about you, Shido?
I hear you have to order using a magic spell.
A spell?

Commentary. For example, "Tall double-shot with
chocolate sauce, extra coffee with whipped caramel
and cream"... Something like that.
AH?! What is that spell?!

Answer. When I went to a coffee shop the other day,
Kaguya was chanting it happily. However, when she
went to pay she screamed.

I-I see. She must have not known that they charge
for the extras... But even without that chant, I can
order.

Laugh. I actually knew. Then please, get me a regular
latte.
Got it. Wait right here.
Thanks for waiting. This is yours, Yuzuru.

Appreciation. I will gladly accept. Was the spell okay,
Shido?

Thanks to you. I just said, "Two tall lattes, s'il
vous plaît."
Deliberation... That's hard to judge.

Sorry, forget what I just said... But drinking a warm
drink makes me feel so calm. Doesn't it make you
feel like you're having a nice, relaxing time?

Agreed. Yes, I do feel that way. Oh, I have something
nice for you.
Nice?
Request. Yes Shido. Come closer. And close your eyes.
Huh? Like this...?
(I wonder... Yuzuru is close to me.)
Appeal. Shido, I will borrow your ear.

(As Yuzuru said that, suddenly gentle music came
flowing in my ear.)
Earphones...? Oh, you brought a music player?

Affirmative. I listen to this when I have the time. It's
only one side, but please bear with me.
Then the other side is...

(I opened my eyes and saw that Yuzuru was leaning
against me with her eyes closed. The other side of
the earphones was connected to Yuzuru's ear.)

Request. Shido, don't move too far away. The earphones
will come off.
...Is it only because of that?
Silence. I can't answer that. You think on your own.
Is that so...

(I did as Yuzuru requested and leaned against her so
that the earphones wouldn't fall out.)
So this is what you usually listen to.

Affirmative. It's healing music. This calms me the
most. Of course, I listen to other genres as well.
(Yuzuru played a variety of songs for me.)

(Rock, pop, classical. There were also metal songs.
I'm sure that is more Kaguya's choice...)

(Yuzuru's player was on shuffle, so we listened to the
songs as they came and went, and spent a nice time
together.)

Thanks for coming out with me today. I had fun,
Yuzuru.
Appreciation. The feeling is mutual, Shido.
It's nice to spend time like this. Let's come again.
Just you and me again.
Next time, it'll be the three of us.
Just you and me again.
Question. Shido, what do you mean by that...?

Oh, well, nothing deep. It felt different from when
it's the three of us. It's fun when we're all
together, but I feel like you were friendlier.

So I thought you might like another day like that.
We're dating, but we don't always have to have the
three of us together, right?

Unhappy. Some of your expressions are questionable,
but yes. I would like to come with you again. However,
please do not ignore Kaguya.

I know that. That's why I said from time to time. Then
it's fine, right?
Request. Okay. Will you invite me again?
Yeah. If it would make you happy, Yuzuru. I promise.

Feverish. That makes me happy. I'm going to go home
for today... I will see you tomorrow, Shido.
Next time, we'll be sure to bring Kaguya.

Answer. Right... But I feel like from time to time, it
could just be Shido and Yuzuru.
...Huh, Yuzuru?

Leaving. Shido, thank you for today. I will be on my
way now.
Oh, Yuzuru...!

(I didn't really think deeply about that. I was just
thinking of a date without Kaguya. I didn't know
then―)
